description: This file defines a Data Transfer Object (DTO) named NoteRequest used for creating or updating notes through web API requests. It includes fields for title, content, and tags, with validation and schema annotations.

classes.name: NoteRequest
classes.description: A DTO class for note creation or update requests, including validation and API schema annotations.

methods.name: NoteRequest
methods.description: Default constructor for the NoteRequest class.

methods.name: NoteRequest
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for initializing NoteRequest with title, content, and tags.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Retrieves the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Retrieves the content/body of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content/body of the note.

methods.name: getTags
methods.description: Retrieves the list of tags associated with the note.

methods.name: setTags
methods.description: Sets the list of tags for the note.
